title: Talking Tech Stocks with Adam Seessel
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and Adam Seessel, founder of Gravity Capital Management, discuss the outlook for tech stocks in a troubled market, and the growth potential of Amazon.com, Alphabet, Intuit, and other "wide-moat" companies.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
